Jetpack Cat

A fearless feline pilot equipped with Brigitte’s latest jet-propulsion invention, Jetpack Cat brings adorable aerial support to the battlefield.

Support

Watchpoint: Gibraltar

Unknown

Abilities

Biotic PawjectilesFrenetic FlightLifelinePurrCatnapper

Biotic Pawjectiles

Mid-range projectile spread that heals allies and damages enemies.

Frenetic Flight

Accelerate in your movement direction. Fuel recovery is slower while carrying another player.

Lifeline

Toggle into transport mode, allowing an ally to be towed. Increases movement speed and heals your ally.

Purr

Pulsing area heal that increases in frequency over time. Knockback nearby enemies when activated.

Catnapper

Dive towards a ground location, knocking down enemies and tethering the nearest one to you.

Keys displayed are defaults for PC. They are configurable in game.

Story

A stray cat mysteriously turned up at Watchpoint: Gibraltar, and resident feline fanatic Brigitte was eager to adopt her. Since her early days, Brigitte has been using her cats as workshop assistants, imagining them in outlandish situations. But when Talon attacked Gibraltar, those farfetched dreams became a possible saving grace. Brigitte constructed a jetpack that would allow the cat to fly into battle and lend a helping paw to any teammates in need.

SMART KITTY

One day, Brigitte discovered a lone cat wandering around the Watchpoint: Gibraltar landing bay. With no clues about the kitty’s owner, she decided to take her in, naming her “Fika” in honor of her Kanelbullar coloring and endless appetite for treats. In her downtime, Brigitte imagined fitting her new feline friend with a jetpack—a silly dream she’d had since she was young.

When Talon launched their attack on Gibraltar, Brigitte thought it best to put the project aside. But soon, she realized that if Overwatch was to stand a fighting chance against this new enemy, they'd need all the help they could get. With enough resources and a good reason, Brigitte finally realized her childhood dreams and constructed a jetpack fit for little Fika.

Now, she's as much a contributor to Overwatch as any other—and all for the better, considering the trials against Talon lying ahead. Of course, getting Sojourn to approve a jetpack wielding cat for use in the field is sure to be an uphill battle, but Brigitte has a few ideas (and a lot of data) to help let this cat out of the bag.
